author: jeremias
msg: IP Clearance: PostScript DSC Parser for XML Graphics Commons

author: ate
msg: Removing the harcoded jetspeed-2 portal container integration from the bridges demo wars.
This makes them jetspeed-2 independent and they can now again be deployed to other portal containers.

author: djencks
msg: simplify dependencies.  A runtime module should not depend on a builder module.  This works for me, let me know if there are problems

author: jmcconnell
msg: working ibatis example with two tables, only one being used in the test case though

author: ate
msg: m2 hot-deploy-war task deploys now to the jetspeed-2 deploy folder (for not yet infused wars),
and a new m2 hot-deploy-infused-war task deploys directly into the tomcat webapps directory.
The Jetspeed-2 specific j2-admin, demo and rss wars are already infused so for those the hot-deploy-infused-war task is used.
The used bridges demo wars (jsf-demo, jpetstore) are going to be modified back to be jetspeed-2 independent, so will need to be infused on deployment.
